# topShelfItems

**Instance Property**

An array of content items that are the items of a section.

## Declaration

```swift
var topShelfItems: [TVContentItem]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this property is non-`nil`, the content item represents a section item in a sectioned Top Shelf style. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/TVTopShelfContentStyle]. The title property must also be set to a non-`nil` string.

## Inspecting the General Display Properties

- **badgeCount**: A badging integer for this item.
- **title**: The localized string title of the item.

items.description: A badging integer for this item.
